languages.text: "Вы страшный, жесткий, пугающий человек, {name}. И всегда добиваетесь своего — но я боюсь. А иногда... иногда я вас ненавижу. Несмотря на все чувства, что вы поднимаете в моей душе... Нет. Вашей я не буду никогда. Это конец, Вольный Торговец. Примите мой отказ с достоинством".

traits.locale_text: "Вы страшный, жесткий, пугающих человек, {name}. И всегда добиваетесь своего — но я боюсь. А иногда... иногда я вас ненавижу. Несмотря на все чувства, что вы поднимаете в моей душе... Нет. Вашей я не буду никогда. Это конец, Вольный Торговец. Примите мой отказ с достоинством".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."
languages.original_text: "Вы страшный, жесткий, пугающий человек, {name}. И всегда добиваетесь своего — но я боюсь. А иногда... иногда я вас ненавижу. Несмотря на все чувства, что вы поднимаете в моей душе... Нет. Вашей я не буду никогда. Это конец, Вольный Торговец. Примите мой отказ с достоинством".

traits.locale_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always get what you want, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept your rejection with dignity."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「恐ろしく無慈悲なお人ですね、{name}様。あなたの進む道は必ずある。確かにそうかもしれませんが、あたくしは恐怖を抱くのです。時々…時々、あなたが嫌いになります。あなたの存在があたくしの心を呼び覚ますような気がするのに…いえ、あたくしはあなたにはなるつもりもありません。これまでです、自由開拓者。あたくしの尊厳在る拒絶を受け入れなさい」
languages.original_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."

traits.locale_text: 「恐ろしく無慈悲なお人ですね、{name}様。あなたの進む道は必ずある。確かにそうかもしれませんが、あたくしは恐怖を抱くのです。時々…時々、あなたが嫌いになります。あなたの存在があたくしの心を呼び覚ますような気がするのに…いえ、あたくしはあなたにはなるつもりもありません。これまでです、自由開拓者。あたくしの尊厳在る拒絶を受け入れなさい」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你是个可怕而又无情的人，{name}。没错，你总是能找到办法实现目标，但我很害怕。有的时候……有的时候我恨你，尽管你的出现唤醒了我心中的情感……不，我绝不会永远留在你身边。就是这样，行商浪人，体面地接受我的拒绝吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."

traits.locale_text: “你是个可怕而又无情的人，{name}。没错，你总是能找到办法实现目标，但我很害怕。有的时候……有的时候我恨你，尽管你的出现唤醒了我心中的情感……不，我绝不会永远留在你身边。就是这样，行商浪人，体面地接受我的拒绝吧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes quelqu'un d'aussi effrayant et qu'impitoyable, {name}. Certes, vous finissez toujours par obtenir ce que vous voulez, mais vous me terrifiez. Parfois, même... il m'arrive de vous haïr. Et ce, malgré les sentiments que votre présence éveille dans mon cœur... Non. Jamais je ne serai vôtre. C'est fini, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Acceptez mon refus avec dignité. »
languages.original_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes quelqu'un d'aussi effrayant et qu'impitoyable, {name}. Certes, vous finissez toujours par obtenir ce que vous voulez, mais vous me terrifiez. Parfois, même... il m'arrive de vous haïr. Et ce, malgré les sentiments que votre présence éveille dans mon cœur... Non. Jamais je ne serai vôtre. C'est fini, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Acceptez mon refus avec dignité. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Es usted una persona aterradora y despiadada, {name}. Siempre hace cumplir su voluntad, es cierto, pero me horroriza. Y en ocasiones... en ocasiones, {mf|le|la} detesto. A pesar de los sentimientos que su presencia despierta en mi corazón... no. Nunca seré suya. Esa es mi respuesta, Comerciante Independiente. Acéptela con dignidad».
languages.original_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted una persona aterradora y despiadada, {name}. Siempre hace cumplir su voluntad, es cierto, pero me horroriza. Y en ocasiones... en ocasiones, {mf|le|la} detesto. A pesar de los sentimientos que su presencia despierta en mi corazón... no. Nunca seré suya. Esa es mi respuesta, Comerciante Independiente. Acéptela con dignidad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid furchterregend und gnadenlos, {name}. Ihr bekommt immer, was Ihr wollt, ja. Doch ich habe fürchterliche Angst vor Euch. Und manchmal ... manchmal hasse ich Euch. Trotz der Gefühle, die Eure Anwesenheit in meinem Herzen weckt ... Nein. Ich werde niemals Euch gehören. Es ist aus, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Akzeptiert meine Zurückweisung mit Würde."
languages.original_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid furchterregend und gnadenlos, {name}. Ihr bekommt immer, was Ihr wollt, ja. Doch ich habe fürchterliche Angst vor Euch. Und manchmal ... manchmal hasse ich Euch. Trotz der Gefühle, die Eure Anwesenheit in meinem Herzen weckt ... Nein. Ich werde niemals Euch gehören. Es ist aus, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Akzeptiert meine Zurückweisung mit Würde."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Korkunç ve gaddar bir insansın {name}. İstediğin her şey oluyor, doğru. Lakin beni korkutuyorsun. Bazen de... Bazen de senden nefret ediyorum. Yanında olunca kalbimde yeşeren hislere rağmen... Hayır. Asla seninle olmayacağım. Diyeceğimi dedim Hür Tacir. Reddimi haysiyetle kabullen."
languages.original_text: "You are a frightening and ruthless person, {name}. You always have your way, it's true, but I am terrified. And sometimes... sometimes I hate you. In spite of the feelings that your presence awakens in my heart... No. I will never be yours. This is it, Rogue Trader. Accept my rejection with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Korkunç ve gaddar bir insansın {name}. İstediğin her şey oluyor, doğru. Lakin beni korkutuyorsun. Ve bazen... Bazen senden nefret ediyorum. Yanında olunca kalbimde doğan hislere rağmen... Hayır. Asla seninle olmayacağım. Diyeceğimi dedim Hür Tacir. Reddimi haysiyetle kabullen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
